Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:




Demon Wulf stabbed his blade at the middle of Reptilica's back.  
"We need to speak, Zardus."

Flesh Ripper and Dark Claw stood ready, not looking back to Wulf, but keeping 
their optics on Zardus.
